TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PSClientError extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable

Docs.summary: Contains information about a SOAP exception for a PSI method.

remarks.para: To get a list of all errors that occur if you get an exception when you call a PSI method, pass the SoapException object to the class constructor. You can then use to store the error information in a PSErrorInfo array and enumerate the errors, as in the following example.

Note: The PSErrorInfo object may not include all of the information you need. For example, if you use Resource.CheckOutResources where some of the resources are already checked out, PSErrorInfo shows the reason for failure for each resource that cannot be checked out, but does not include the resource name or GUID. For a way to get more information, see .

Docs.param: A string that contains error information in XML format.
Docs.summary: Creates an instance of the PSClientError class.

Docs.summary: Creates an instance of the PSClientError class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer
public: property int Count { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the number of errors reported by the PSClientError object.
Name of the column added to the error DataSet if a List<PSErrorInfo[]> of PSErrorInfo objects is requested.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Office.Project.Server.Library.PSErrorInfo[] GetAllErrors() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets an array of PSErrorInfo objects describing all current errors.

remarks.para: To get a list of all errors that occur if you get an exception when you call a PSI method, pass the SoapException object to the class constructor. You can then use to store the error information in a PSErrorInfo array and enumerate the errors, as in the following example.

Note: The PSErrorInfo object may not include all of the information you need. For example, if you use Resource.CheckOutResources where one of the resources is already checked out, PSErrorInfo shows the reason for failure for each resource that cannot be checked out, but does not include the resource name or GUID. For a way to get more information, see .

Docs.summary: Gets an array of PSErrorInfo objects describing all current general errors of all classes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Office.Project.Server.Library.PSErrorInfo[] GetArrayItemErrors(string arrayName, object item) cil managed
Public Function GetArrayItemErrors (arrayName As String, item As Object) As PSErrorInfo()
public: cli::array <Microsoft::Office::Project::Server::Library::PSErrorInfo ^> ^ GetArrayItemErrors(System::String ^ arrayName, System::Object ^ item);

Docs.param: Name of the array, or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if the array has no name.
Item in the array to get error information about.
Docs.summary: Gets an array of PSErrorInfo objects describing each error on the specified array item in a SOAP exception for a PSI method call.

Docs.summary: Gets the names of arrays the PSClientError object contains for a PSI method call.

Docs.summary: Gets the names of datasets that contain errors for a PSI method call.
Docs.returns: Array of DataSet names the error object contains.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object[] GetErrorArray(string arrayName) cil managed
Public Function GetErrorArray (arrayName As String) As Object()

Docs.param: Name of the array, or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if the array has no name.
Docs.summary: Gets an array containing all the items which were set as error items in a SOAP exception for a PSI method call.

remarks.para: The type of the returned object array is the same as the type of the original array items.

MemberSignature.Value: public object[] GetErrorArray (string arrayName, out System.Collections.Generic.List<Microsoft.Office.Project.Server.Library.PSErrorInfo[]> errorInfoList);

.method public hidebysig instance object[] GetErrorArray(string arrayName, [out] class System.Collections.Generic.List`1<class Microsoft.Office.Project.Server.Library.PSErrorInfo[]>& errorInfoList) cil managed
Public Function GetErrorArray (arrayName As String, ByRef errorInfoList As List(Of PSErrorInfo())) As Object()

Docs.param: Name of the array, or a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if the array has no name.
Docs.summary: Gets an array containing all the items which were set as error items in a SOAP exception for a PSI method call.
Docs.returns: Array of error items. Also returns a List<PSErrorInfo[]> of PSErrorInfo arrays which describe all errors for each item.

remarks.para: The type of the returned object array is the same as the type of the original array items.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.DataSet GetErrorDataSet(string dataSetName) cil managed
Public Function GetErrorDataSet (dataSetName As String) As DataSet

Docs.param: Name of the DataSet. Set to a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if the DataSet has no name.
Docs.summary: Gets the specified DataSet that contains all tables and rows which have had errors previously set for a PSI method call.

remarks.para: Modifying the returned DataSet has no effect on the PSClientError object.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Data.DataSet GetErrorDataSet (string dataSetName, out System.Collections.Generic.List<Microsoft.Office.Project.Server.Library.PSErrorInfo[]> errInfoList);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.DataSet GetErrorDataSet(string dataSetName, [out] class System.Collections.Generic.List`1<class Microsoft.Office.Project.Server.Library.PSErrorInfo[]>& errInfoList) cil managed
Public Function GetErrorDataSet (dataSetName As String, ByRef errInfoList As List(Of PSErrorInfo())) As DataSet

Docs.param: Name of the DataSet. Set to a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) if the DataSet has no name.
Docs.summary: Gets a DataSet that contains all tables and rows which have had errors previously set for a PSI method call.
Docs.returns: The error DataSet. Also returns a List with PSErrorInfo[] arrays that describe the error.

remarks.para: Each table in the returned DataSet has one additional column named ErrorIndex, of type int. The ErrorIndex column maps specific DataRows to entries in the returned List<PSErrorInfo[]>.

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether any errors reported by the PSClientError object are array errors for the PSI method.
Docs.value: True if any errors reported by the PSClientError object are array errors for the PSI method; otherwise, False.

public: property bool HasErrors { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the PSClientError object contains any errors from a PSI call.
Docs.value: True if the PSClientError object contains any errors from a PSI call; otherwise, False.

Docs.summary: Gets the last error set in a SOAP exception for a PSI method call.
